--create topic testtopic;
use test;
0 rows returned
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 tinyint,
    col2 int,
    col3 double,
    col4 decimal(65, 30),
    col5 varchar,
    col6 timestamp(6),
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1,
        v2,
        v3,
        v4,
        v5,
        v6
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_1;

select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col1 | col2        | col3         | col4         | col5         | col6                       |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -9223372036854775808 | -128 | -2147483648 | -112345678.. | 1234567898.. | iquwhsiquw.. | 2020-01-03 01:00:00.123456 |
| -2                   | -1   | -1          | -1.1         | -12345.543.. | oranges      | 2020-01-02 01:00:00.123456 |
| 1                    | 1    | 1           | 1.1          | 12345.5432.. | avocados     | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.123456 |
| 9223372036854775807  | 127  | 2147483647  | 1123456789.. | -123456789.. | uiqwhdiuqw.. | 2020-01-04 01:00:00.123456 |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
4 rows returned

set max_line_width 200;
0 rows returned

+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col1 | col2        | col3                                    | col4                                    | col5                                    | col6                       |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -9223372036854775808 | -128 | -2147483648 | -112345678901234000000000000000000000.. | 12345678987654321234567898765432123.1.. | iquwhsiquwhsiuqwhsiuqhsuqwhsiuqwhsiuq.. | 2020-01-03 01:00:00.123456 |
| -2                   | -1   | -1          | -1.1                                    | -12345.543210000000000000000000000000   | oranges                                 | 2020-01-02 01:00:00.123456 |
| 1                    | 1    | 1           | 1.1                                     | 12345.543210000000000000000000000000    | avocados                                | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.123456 |
| 9223372036854775807  | 127  | 2147483647  | 1123456789012340000000000000000000000.. | -12345678987654321234567898765432123... | uiqwhdiuqwhdiuqwhdiuqwdiuhqwdiuhqwduh.. | 2020-01-04 01:00:00.123456 |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
4 rows returned

set max_line_width 50;
0 rows returned

set foo 123;
Failed to execute statement: Unknown property: foo

set max_line_width oranges;
Failed to execute statement: Invalid max_line_width value: oranges

set max_line_width 0;
Failed to execute statement: Invalid max_line_width value: 0

set max_line_width -1;
Failed to execute statement: Invalid max_line_width value: -1

set bar;
Failed to execute statement: Invalid set command. Should be set <prop_name> <prop_value>

set;
Failed to execute statement: Invalid set command. Should be set <prop_name> <prop_value>

set max_line_width 80;
0 rows returned

select * from test_source_1 order by col0;

| col0     | col1     | col2     | col3     | col4     | col5     | col6     |

| -92233.. | -128     | -21474.. | -11234.. | 123456.. | iquwhs.. | 2020-0.. |

4 rows returned

--create topic testtopic2;

create source test_source_2(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 varchar,
    col2 double,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic2",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1,
        v2
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_2;

select * from test_source_2 order by col0;
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col1                      | col2                      |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1                    | apples                    | 1.234                     |
| 2                    | pears                     | 2.345                     |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
2 rows returned

set max_line_width 120;
0 rows returned

select * from test_source_2 order by col0;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col1                                          | col2                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1                    | apples                                        | 1.234                                         |
| 2                    | pears                                         | 2.345                                         |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
2 rows returned

--create topic testtopic3;

create source test_source_3(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 varchar,
    col2 varchar,
    col3 varchar,
    col4 varchar,
    col5 varchar,
    col6 varchar,
    col7 varchar,
    col8 varchar,
    col9 varchar,
    col10 varchar,
    col11 varchar,
    col12 varchar,
    col13 varchar,
    col14 varchar,
    col15 varchar,
    col16 varchar,
    col17 varchar,
    col18 varchar,
    col19 varchar,
    col20 varchar,
    col21 varchar,
    col22 varchar,
    col23 varchar,
    col24 varchar,
    col25 varchar,
    col26 varchar,
    col27 varchar,
    col28 varchar,
    col29 varchar,
    col30 varchar,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic3",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1,
        v2,
        v3,
        v4,
        v5,
        v6,
        v7,
        v8,
        v9,
        v10,
        v11,
        v12,
        v13,
        v14,
        v15,
        v16,
        v17,
        v18,
        v19,
        v20,
        v21,
        v22,
        v23,
        v24,
        v25,
        v26,
        v27,
        v28,
        v29,
        v30
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_3;

select * from test_source_3 order by col0;
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0  | col1  | col2  | col3  | col4  | col5  | col6  | col7  | col8  | col9  | col10 | col11 | col12 | col13 | col14 | col15 | col16 | col17 | col18 | col19 | col20 | col21 | col22 | col23 | col24 | col25 | col26 | col27 | col28 | col29 | col30 |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1     | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. | abc.. |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned

--create topic testtopic4;

create source test_source_4(
    col0 bigint,
    col________________________________________________________________ varchar,
    col2_______________________________________________________________ varchar,
    col3_______________________________________________________________ varchar,
    col4_______________________________________________________________ varchar,
    col5_______________________________________________________________ varchar,
    col6_______________________________________________________________ varchar,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic4",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1,
        v2,
        v3,
        v4,
        v5,
        v6
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_4;

select * from test_source_4 order by col0;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col________.. | col2_______.. | col3_______.. | col4_______.. | col5_______.. | col6_______.. |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1                    | a             | b             | c             | d             | e             | f             |
| 2                    | g             | h             | i             | j             | k             | l             |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
2 rows returned

--create topic testtopic5;
create source test_source_5(
    col0 bigint,
    looooooooooooooooooooong_col_name tinyint,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic5",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_5;

-- col name longer than col width;
select looooooooooooooooooooong_col_name from test_source_5 order by col0;
+-----------------------------------+
| looooooooooooooooooooong_col_name |
+-----------------------------------+
| 123                               |
+-----------------------------------+
1 rows returned

drop source test_source_5;
0 rows returned
drop source test_source_4;
0 rows returned
drop source test_source_3;
0 rows returned
drop source test_source_2;
0 rows returned
drop source test_source_1;
0 rows returned

--delete topic testtopic5;
--delete topic testtopic4;
--delete topic testtopic3;
--delete topic testtopic2;
--delete topic testtopic;
